channel.title: Made a server just need help! please help me i beg you
channel.description: ok i made a server, now how do i get my ip address i have a no ip org thingy, and how do i get npc, monsters, item and all that good stuff on my server? i can log in through moparscape 3.0 and walk around but no npc!!!!!!!! please help, also my ip address that no ip says is that the one ppl connect to? and if someone can help me learn how to script or show me where to put scripts and give me a few i would love it...thanks

item.description:
@saintspader wrote:

ok, i have an account on no-ip.org its called spaderscape.no-ip.org, i have a hamachi, i get on motar scape and put in spaderscape.no-ip.org and nothing happens!!! then i use my ip from no ip and nothing!, also on hamchi how do i make a server i mean it looks like this

so how do i make the little things under my server, where it says the ip and the host?

Read full topic
item.source: Made a server just need help! please help me i beg you

item.title: Made a server just need help! please help me i beg you
item.dc:creator: @Blazpkr Blazpkr
item.description:
@Blazpkr wrote:

Ok dude if you want to place monsters when u have your source open it up and click a file called npc and it should come up with the names and numbers for every monster. Choose the npc that you would like. Then go on your server. And stand were you want to place to your npc to find the coordinates you are at. Click the Run tab and there should be a few numbers under the run and walk option they should look something like this. X3432 Y3234. Then to place the npc go on the autospawn document. And there should be a list of numbers and npcs that are on your server. If you want to add a new npc. Do the same as it is for the others. But put the Npc number you would like to place. I dont know why but u have to press tab to get to next place dont press spacebar. Because the spacebar i donno why but it doesnt work. Anyway the first colum is the NPC number so place the NPC number there. Then the next collum is the first coord u want to place it in the x axis. Then the second colum is the y axis. Next one is height just put it as 0. Then the next one is the range x axis this is were they walk to i havent worked out how to make them move yet not sure why. Anyway the other 3 colums are also the ranges then the one after is the walk type. And then the end one is the NPC name. There you go you should be able to attack your npc without the server crashing. Sorry that i cant be more help hope you get it sorted soon:)

Read full topic
item.source: Made a server just need help! please help me i beg you
